description: This is the main entry point for a React-based frontend application. It initializes the React app by attaching it to the DOM element with id 'root' and rendering the <App /> component within React.StrictMode.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root React DOM node to enable rendering of React elements.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the DOM.
